text:
Lansing proprietary | Moorgate, London, UK | Full-time | 2 to 4 yrs experience | Python | ONSITE

https://lansing-proprietary.workable.com/jobs/726197

Efficient markets in global food supplies are necessary for cheap and plentiful food for all, but most participants in these markets across the world don't use modern data technologies. Lansing Proprietary is a data-driven investment manager specialising in the agricultural commodities that underpin the global supply of food, such as wheat, soybeans, corn and sugar. We combine a deep and specific understanding of these markets with expertise in state-of-the-art quantitative and statistical techniques, including machine learning.
